name: breq12i
params: class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4
body: |- wb(wbr(c0, c1, c2), wbr(c3, c1, c4))

stmt.origin: mp2an(wb(wbr(c0, c1, c2), wbr(c3, c1, c4)), wceq(c0, c3), wceq(c2, c4))

body.origin:
|- wb(wbr(c0, c1, c2), wbr(c3, c1, c4))
-| wceq(c0, c3)
-| wceq(c2, c4)
-| wi(wa(wceq(c0, c3), wceq(c2, c4)), wb(wbr(c0, c1, c2), wbr(c3, c1, c4)))

cumulated.origin:
|- wb(wbr(c0, c1, c2), wbr(c3, c1, c4))
-| wceq(c0, c3)
-| wceq(c2, c4)
-| wi(wa(wceq(c0, c3), wceq(c2, c4)), wb(wbr(c0, c1, c2), wbr(c3, c1, c4)))

body.origin: |- wi(wa(wceq(c0, c3), wceq(c2, c4)), wb(wbr(c0, c1, c2), wbr(c3, c1, c4)))

cumulated.origin:
|- wb(wbr(c0, c1, c2), wbr(c3, c1, c4))
-| wceq(c0, c3)
-| wceq(c2, c4)

comment: Equality inference for a binary relation. (Contributed by NM, 8-Feb-1996.) (Proof shortened by Eric Schmidt, 4-Apr-2007.)
